tool_description: Validates scraped price data for accuracy, completeness, and consistency, flagging potential errors or anomalies.

raw_price_data.description: Raw price data entries to validate

validation_rules.description: Validation rules: price_range, currency_format, required_fields, outlier_detection

error_messages: Invalid data structure: Raw price data must be JSON strings with required fields (product_id, price, retailer, timestamp).
Price out of range: Prices must be between specified minimum and maximum values.
Missing required fields: All entries must contain product_id, price, retailer, and timestamp.
Invalid validation rules: Use only supported rules: price_range, currency_format, required_fields, outlier_detection.
usage: Submit raw price data with validation rules and acceptable price ranges. Returns validated data and error reports.

valid_records.description: Validated price data entries that passed all checks

invalid_records.description: Data entries that failed validation with error reasons

validation_summary.description: Summary of validation results and issues found

pass_rate.description: Percentage of records that passed validation
